member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:NoAdapterAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.returns: Amount of Rows Affected

member.summary: Executes Reader Command using The Transact-SQL Query
member.returns: Datatable Containing the Result of the Select Query

member.name: M:NoAdapterAPI.Models.DatabaseManager.ExecuteScalar(System.String)
member.summary: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty. Returns a maximum of 2033 characters.

member.name: M:NoAdapterAPI.Models.DatabaseManager.CloseConnection
member.summary: Closes The SQL Server Connection
member.returns: A Boolean to indicate if Connection Termination Succeded
